title: How do you get a three letter name?
body:
How do you get a three letter name?

 just tried to get the name SGF my initials, but it says the username has to be over 4 letters long. I have several friends with a three letter name so im wondering if there is a way around this. Thanks!

replies.body: A summoner name requires a minimum of 3 characters so you should be okay to make that.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still having this issue so we can take a look with you individually.  This could be an issue so we want to investigate further to figure out what's going on, and if possible manually assist with your name.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
